definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: Her tiny, round lips were full like a tulip bulb.
sentences.chinese: 兩片小而圓潤的嘴脣好似鬱金香的球莖般豐滿。

sentences.english: When you eat it like sliced torfu, it is albumen of egg boiled in tea.
sentences.chinese: 好似切片的豆腐乾，喫起來竟是茶葉蛋的蛋白。

sentences.english: He picked it up as if were a pipe.
sentences.chinese: 他將它拾起，並發現它好似一隻笛管。

sentences.english: I wandered lonely as a clou.
sentences.chinese: 我好似一朵孤獨的流雲。

sentences.english: We use “bad habits” the way drug users use drugs.
sentences.chinese: 我們對待壞習慣就好似癮君子對待毒品。

sentences.english: Wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
sentences.chinese: 智慧就好似不要把它放進水果沙拉里。

sentences.english: Those who show extent decorate very special, the cirque that layer upon layer photograph covers seem.
sentences.chinese: 展示區域的佈置十分特別，好似層層相套的圓環。

sentences.english: Her body was as white ivory, and her tail was of silver and pearl.
sentences.chinese: 她的身子白若象牙，而尾巴則好似珍珠與銀子的顏色。

sentences.english: Where the snow is like a cold wind plum, frozen ice core incense, but also lonely and also gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 好似凜冽寒風裏雪中一枝梅，凍蕊冰香，又寂又豔。

sentences.english: The snowfall seemed to be stopping, but he believed that it was last until he got home.
sentences.chinese: 雪好似停了，但他相信它會一直下知道他回到家。

sentences.english: When you visit, you feel slightly out of sync, like a half-foreigner.
sentences.chinese: 再回去的時候，感覺有點不能同步，好似半個外國人。

sentences.english: On the other hand autumn sakura learn elder sister and o base to produce between like something.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面秋櫻學姐與阿基之間好似要產生什麼似的。

sentences.english: Your mind is like this water, when it agitated, it becomes difficulit to see.
sentences.chinese: 你的心好似這潭湖水，如果波瀾起伏，就會模糊不清。

sentences.english: The moving waters at their priestlike task of pure ablution round earth's human shores.
sentences.chinese: 凝視海水沖洗塵世的崖岸，好似牧師行施淨體的沐浴。

sentences.english: Facial expression agreeable sweetheart of quite intimate.
sentences.chinese: 神情好似情人間的耳鬢廝磨。

sentences.english: Sometimes silence can seem so loud.
sentences.chinese: 有時沉默好似震天驚雷。

definition: to be as if.../to be rather like...
seems as if/rather like/Taiwan pr. [si4 de5]
(literary) to be exactly like/to be exactly as if
